channel.title: [PI] 80% Turmoil for Project Insanity
channel.description:
Purpose: Turmoil Difficulty: basic Assumed Knowledge: java Classes Modified: rsinterface, combatassistance, some sprites, clickingbuttons Tested On(if it applies): Project Insanity
Step 1: The sprites
Go to the client folder Project Insanity>client>sprites>prayer
then right click on prayon 7 and press edit and get this sprite: [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/1216czo.png[/img]
now u do prayoff 7, its the same thing only made it negative colours in paint: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/604138/PRAYOFF_7.PNG[/img]
Step 2: RsInterface.java (1/10) this part is optional but still cool for ur own server
what u do is u go to client folder again and go to rsinterface.java then u find this code
[code]18014[/code]
and change piety into
[code]Turmoil[/code]
that way when u right click turmoil it actually says turmoil instead if piety ;]
Step 3: CombatAssistance (1/10) Project Insanity>src>>server>model>players>combatassistanc e this step makes sure your turmoil has the right defence/atk/strength bonuses
find this code
[code]c.prayerActive[25][/code]
and where it below line it says
[code]* 0.2[/code]
change that with
[code]* 0.32[/code]
do it for all the c.prayerActive[25] im not sure how much defence or attack but strength is 0.32
Step 4: Clickingbuttons (4/10) Project insanity>src>model>players>packets>clickingbuttons now u do the emote thingy i have custom prayer thingy
find the code
[code]case 70094[/code]
and below
[code]c.getCombat().activePrayer(25)[/code]
add
[code]c.gfx100(1224); c.startAnimation(2113);[/code]
98% credits to Glowindagger on google.org 2% to alecsofly for sprites
THIS WAS NOT MADE BY ME, I JUST POSTED IT TO MOPAR WITH PERMISSION FROM GLOW!!!

item.title: [PI] 80% Turmoil for Project Insanity
item.dc:creator: @Neruzycra Neruzycra
item.description:
@Neruzycra wrote:

Purpose: Turmoil
Difficulty: basic
Assumed Knowledge: java
Classes Modified: rsinterface, combatassistance, some sprites, clickingbuttons
Tested On(if it applies): Project Insanity

Step 1: The sprites

Go to the client folder
Project Insanity>client>sprites>prayer

then right click on prayon 7 and press edit and get this sprite:

now u do prayoff 7, its the same thing only made it negative colours in paint:

Step 2: RsInterface.java (1/10)
this part is optional but still cool for ur own server

what u do is u go to client folder again and go to rsinterface.java
then u find this code

18014

and change piety into

Turmoil

that way when u right click turmoil it actually says turmoil instead if piety ;]

Step 3: CombatAssistance (1/10)
Project Insanity>src>>server>model>players>combatassistanc e
this step makes sure your turmoil has the right defence/atk/strength bonuses

find this code

c.prayerActive[25]

and where it below line it says

* 0.2

change that with

* 0.32

do it for all the c.prayerActive[25]
im not sure how much defence or attack but strength is 0.32

Step 4: Clickingbuttons (4/10)
Project insanity>src>model>players>packets>clickingbuttons
now u do the emote thingy i have custom prayer thingy

find the code

case 70094

and below

c.getCombat().activePrayer(25)

add

c.gfx100(1224); c.startAnimation(2113);

98% credits to Glowindagger on google.org
2% to alecsofly for sprites

THIS WAS NOT MADE BY ME, I JUST POSTED IT TO MOPAR WITH PERMISSION FROM GLOW!!!

Read full topic
